SAVE FIX

you can use other,s game save's too with this method and this works with any version of the game

 go to game save folder c/program files/steam/userdata/what ever large # you have here, and what ever your save file is, 57940 was the one we used to use .

 delete the remotecache "vdf" file

now create 13140 and copy the "remote " file there,

restart smart steam 2 times,

then start the game you will see no saves!

turn game off, restart smart steam,

restart game, game save should now be there!

this creates a new " vdf " file for the save and that makes it work
